title: Chris Cuomo: CNN anchor says he has passed coronavirus to his wife
description: New York governor Andrew Cuomo told his brother, and CNN host, that his situation 'is what families are dealing with'
content:
Two weeks after testing positive for the coronavirus, CNN anchor Chris Cuomo confirmed that his wife now has the disease during an interview with Andrew Cuomo, his brother and New York governor.
Cristina now has Covid. She is now positive. And it just breaks… [+2072 chars]
